bug.author: strasharo
bug.summary: [BUG] Display output gets disabled on boot when a DVI display is attached
bug.description:
Describe the bug If a user boots with a DVI display attached the display output still gets disabled on boot. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Attach a DVI display through an adapter to the Raspberry Boot pwnagotchi Display gets disabled when boot finishes
Expected behavior Display output shouldn't be disabled. Screenshots None. Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version v1.1.0RC0 OS version Type of hardware Raspberry Zero Any additional hardware used DVI display through an adapter.
Additional context None
